name: Shipwrecked in nine different worlds all at once
name_original: Shipwrecked in nine different worlds all at once
description:
"Shipwrecked in nine different worlds all at once" is made for the shipwreck (bitsy jam).

I used Labyrinthine to generate 27 Bitsy worlds in 9 batches of 3 each. I picked the best one of each batch by loading the game data in Bitsy.

Finally, I used Multi-Bitsy and inspiration by 9 x Effing Monster Hunters!

Your spaceship has crash-landed in nine different worlds simultaneously. Don't ask me how. There's unknowable forces at work here.
